news_header: Red Rock Resorts is expected to report a significant earnings decline but a slight revenue increase in its upcoming quarterly report.
news_original_title: Red Rock Resorts (RRR) Q4 Earnings Preview: What You Should Know Beyond the Headline Estimates
news_text: Red Rock Resorts (RRR) is projected to report quarterly earnings of $0.42 per share, a 55.8% decline from last year, while revenues are expected to rise by 5.8% to $489.58 million. Analysts have slightly adjusted their EPS estimates upward by 0.8% over the past month. Key revenue metrics are forecasted to show growth in various segments, with total net revenue from Las Vegas operations estimated at $481.88 million. The company's shares have increased by 14% in the past month, outperforming the S&P 500.
